text: Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa (born 28 January 1950) is the King of Bahrain. He became King on 14 February 2002. He was also Emir from 6 March 1999."Country Profiles Bahrain" The Arab Center for the Development of the Rule of Law and Integrity Retrieved 2010-12-01 He is the son of Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, the previous Emir. He was proclaimed Crown Prince on June 27, 1964. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1950 births Category:Arab people Category:Bahraini people Category:Living people Category:Kings and queens Category:Current national leaders
title: Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa
